    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [var]                                   1         3
    [x]                                     5         5
    [=]                                     7         7
    [0]                                     9         9
L3
    [fun]                                   1         3
    [increment]                             5         13

L4
    [x]                                     2         2
    [+=]                                    4         5

EOF
